sen.j: 与謝野町（よさのちょう）は、京都府北部の丹後半島中部から付け根にある与謝郡に属する町。
sen.e: Yosano Town is the town located at Yosa District from the foot to the center of Tango Peninsula in northern Kyoto.
Yosano Town is the town located at Yosa District from the foot to the center of Tango Peninsula in northern Kyoto.
Yosano-cho is the town located in Yosa-gun from the foot to the center of Tango Peninsula in northern Kyoto.
sen.cmt: Yosano-cho および Yosa-gun としました。

sen.j: 2006年3月1日、与謝郡の加悦町・岩滝町・野田川町3町が市町村合併して誕生した。
sen.e: It was born from the unification of Kaya, Iwataki, and Nodagawa Towns in Yosa District on March 1, 2006.
It was born from the unification of Kaya, Iwataki, and Nodagawa Towns in Yosa District on March 1, 2006.
It was born from the unification of Kaya-cho, Iwataki-cho, and Nodagawa-cho in Yosa-gun on March 1, 2006.

sen.j: 与謝を「よざ」と発音する人も多いが、正しくは「よさ」と発音する。
sen.e: There are many people who pronounce Yosa as 'Yoza' but the correct pronunciation is 'Yosa.'
There are many people who pronounce Yosa as 'Yoza' but the correct pronunciation is 'Yosa.'
There are many people who pronounce Yosa as 'Yoza' but the correct pronunciation is 'Yosa.'

sen.j: 加悦谷といわれる野田川の扇状地に位置する。
sen.e: It is located at the area of alluvial fan of Noda River called Kaya Valley.
It is located at the area of alluvial fan of Noda River called Kaya Valley.
It is located at the area of alluvial fan of the Noda-gawa River called Kaya Valley.
sen.cmt: "the" を適宜追加しました。noda-gawa としました。

sen.j: 加悦地区の南東方には大江山があり、以前はニッケル鉱山もあった。
sen.e: There is a Ooe Mountain at the southeastern Kaya district, and there was a nickel mine previously.
There is a Ooe Mountain at the southeastern Kaya district, and there was a nickel mine previously.
Mt. Oe is located at the southeastern Kaya district, and there was a nickel mine previously.

sen.j: 野田川町町長初当選当時、京都府内唯一の女性首長として一躍有名になった。
sen.e: She became instantaneously famous for being the only female head in Kyoto Prefecture at the time of passing the election of the town leader of Nodagawa Town.
She became instantaneously famous for being the only female head in Kyoto Prefecture at the time of passing the election of the town leader of Nodagawa Town.
She became instantaneously famous for being the only female head in Kyoto Prefecture at the time of passing the election of the mayor of Nodagawa-cho.
